business.headline: Belrise Industries IPO allotment: Step-by-step guide to check statusThe IPO received a good response from all types of investors. By the end of the three-day bidding period on May 23, it was subscribed 43.14 times.

Explained: Why NIBE share price surged 5% to hit upper circuit todayNIBE share price: The shares of NIBE Ltd surged 5% to hit the upper circuit. The stock has lost 4.43% in the last 5 days, but has gained 18.22% in the past month.

Aegis Vopak Terminals IPO: Subscribe or skip Rs 2,800 crore listing? Check GMPBefore the public issue opened, the company raised Rs 1,259.99 crore from 32 anchor investors. This money was raised at the upper end of the price band, which is Rs 235 per share.

Eternal shares tumble over 3% in early trade. Why is the stock falling?The Zomato stock was trading 3.17% lower on the NSE at 9:38 am, making it the only significant laggard among Nifty50 constituents during morning trade.

Sensex gains 750 points: 3 reasons why stock market is rising todayStock market rally: Sensex surged over 700 points to 82,437.76 in early trade, while Nifty gained over 200 points to 25,063.65 as of 9:50 am.

Sensex jumps over 600 points, Nifty crosses 25,000; Eternal tumbles 3%The BSE Sensex rose 704.45 points to 82,425.53 around 9:53 am while the Nifty50 gained 218.10 points to 25,071.25. Broader market indices were also in the green, reflecting widespread bullish sentiment on Dalal Street.

Leela Hotels IPO opens for bidding: Should you subscribe? Check latest GMPLeela Hotels plans to raise Rs 2,500 crore by issuing 5.75 crore fresh equity shares. An additional Rs 1,000 crore will be raised through the offer for sale (OFS) route, where existing shareholders will sell 2.30 crore shares.

Stock market today: Will Sensex, Nifty open higher on May 26?Market experts believe Nifty may continue to trade in a narrow range, with some key support and resistance levels in focus. Gift Nifty futures were trading at 24,935.5 around 8:09 am, which is above Friday's closing level of 24,853.15 for Nifty50.

Stocks to watch on May 26: Hyundai, Swiggy, Eternal, Paytm, NTPC GreenHyundai Motor India, NTPC Green Energy, Swiggy, and Waaree Energies will be added to the FTSE global equity indices under the largecap category.

India overtakes Japan to become fourth-largest economy: Niti AayogIndia has overtaken Japan to become the world's 4th largest economy, with a GDP of $4 trillion. NITI Aayog projects India will become the 3rd largest economy in the next 2-3 years, surpassing Germany. Factors contributing to this growth include infrastructure development, Make in India initiative, GST implementation, and fiscal discipline during the COVID-19 pandemic. The country has reduced extreme poverty to less than 5% and is poised for rapid growth.

India now fourth-largest economy, ahead of Japan: Niti Aayog CEOIndia's GDP has reached $4 trillion, placing it behind only the US, China, and Germany, according to IMF data cited by NITI Aayog CEO BVR Subrahmanyam.

Trump targets Samsung after tax threat to Apple for India shift: Wouldn't be fairThe US President warned that Samsung, and not only Apple, would face a 25% import tax if its phones were not manufactured in America.
Trump proposes 50% tariff on EU goods from June 1Trump criticised the EU for maintaining restrictive trade practices, levying high taxes, and taking legal action against US companies.

RBI to pay Rs 2.69 lakh crore to government as dividend for FY25The RBI has approved a large dividend of Rs 2.69 lakh crore for the financial year 2025, which is higher than Rs 2.1 lakh crore given last year.

Not India or anyplace else: Trump's 25% tariff warning if iPhones not made in USDonald Trump's statement on levying 25% tariff on iPhones has caused Apple shares to fall by 2.5% in premarket trading, and US stock futures also slipped. However, it's still unclear whether Trump actually has the legal power to impose a tariff on one specific company.

Fresh IPOs likely to flood Dalal Street: Time to ride the wave?Four IPOs are lined up to open in the last week of May. These include Scoda Tubes, Prostarm Info Systems, Leela Hotels (Schloss Bangalore Limited), and Aegis Vopak Terminals.

Rs 10 crore for child's education? Edelweiss' Radhika Gupta's maths and messageRadhika Gupta explained that the current cost of a full higher education in the US is around Rs 2.5 crore. Now, if you consider average inflation of 5% and currency depreciation of 4% every year, the value of that education will go up a lot over the next 16 years.

Sensex, Nifty close higher over US-China trade hopes despite FII outflow fearsThe S&P BSE Sensex added 769.09 points to close at 81,721.08, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 243.45 points to end at 24,853.15.

Microsoft, Google and more cut over 61,000 jobs in 2025: Here's why?One of the biggest cuts came from Microsoft, which let go of 6,000 employees, its largest round of job losses since 2023. Nearly 2,000 of these were in Washington state alone.

Reliance Power Ltd share price rises over 18%. Should you buy?Reliance Power has gained 20.77% in the last month, 51.98% over the last six months, and 99.13% over the past year. Over the last five years, it has gone up by a massive 2,820.56%.

India plans to let US, other foreign firms bid for government contracts: ReportContracts worth over $50 billion, primarily issued by federal agencies, could soon be accessible to US companies as part of a broader effort to strike a limited trade agreement with Washington by early July.

Bajaj Auto to take over KTM with massive €800 million dealThe move is aimed at helping KTM recover from financial trouble and marks a major step forward for Bajaj, which has been a minority investor in KTM since 2007.

'Data can be misleading': Nithin Kamath on rise of Tier 2 and 3 city investorsZerodha's Nithin Kamath explained that if you look at the addresses provided by users during their KYC process, it appears many traders are from Tier 2 and Tier 3 towns. However, this can be misleading because most people don't update their address when they move to a new city.

ITC share price rises 3% today. Check brokerage views and what should investors do?The stock was trading 2.78% higher at Rs 437.95, recovering from Thursday's close of Rs 426.10, as investors appeared to focus on the company's long-term fundamentals rather than short-term headwinds.

Some individuals don't need to file an ITR. Are you one of them?As the 2025–26 financial year begins, the Income Tax Department has released all the seven ITR forms along with the ITR-U form.  But did you know not everyone is required to file a return?

Adani Group to invest Rs 50,000 crore in Northeast over next decadeThe fresh investment commitment comes just months after the Adani Group pledged Rs 50,000 crore in Assam alone, targeting sectors like airports, aero cities, city gas distribution, transmission, cement, and road infrastructure.

Explained: Why IMF gave Pakistan $1 billion despite India's objectionsThe IMF agreed to support Pakistan with a total of $7 billion under the EFF programme. So far, it has given $2.1 billion in two separate instalments.

Have BSE shares really crashed? Here's why some apps show a 66% fallThe apparent crash was just a technical adjustment following the company's 2:1 bonus issue, which turned the stock ex-bonus today. Some trading platforms may not have accounted for this corporate action in their price charts, leading to misleading visuals of a steep 65% drop. In reality, the share price simply adjusted to reflect the bonus allotment.

Sensex jumps 900 points: Why stock market is rising today and what next?Market watchers suggest the current bounce is likely driven by a 'buy-on-dips' strategy that many investors have adopted amid recent volatility. Despite concerns about the global macro environment, the strength in domestic fundamentals seems to be offering support.

Honasa shares rise 13% despite decline in Q4 net profitThe company's revenue from operations went up by 13% year-on-year (YoY), reaching Rs 534 crore in Q4FY25. However, despite the rise in revenue, Honasa's consolidated net profit fell by 18% YoY.
Sensex, Nifty move up in early session despite concerns over FII flowsThe S&P BSE Sensex went up by 289.27 points to 81,241.26, while the NSE Nifty50 added 119.15 points to 24,728.85 as of 9:29 am.

Borana Weaves IPO allotment: Step-by-step guide to check statusBorana Weaves IPO opened for subscription on May 20 and closed on May 22. The IPO saw strong demand from all investor groups. It was subscribed 147.85 times in total.

GST rates may change soon as fresh revamp talks begin: ReportGST, which was launched in July 2017, brought together many indirect taxes into one system and created a single national market. The latest round of talks follows the government's introduction of a bill in February this year to simplify income tax laws.

Sensex, Nifty opening: Stock market likely to open higher today. Here's whyStock market opening: The Nifty50 index may open slightly above its previous close. Gift Nifty futures were trading at 24,692.5 at 7:59 am, showing a possible rise from Thursday's close of 24,609.7.

Stocks to watch on May 23: ITC, Ola, Honasa, Sun Pharma, JSW SteelA number of companies will release their January-March quarter results today. These include JSW Steel, Ashok Leyland, Glenmark Pharmaceuticals, Afcons Infrastructure, etc.

Sensex closes 645 points lower, Nifty below 24,700; IndusInd Bank gains 2%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 644.64 points to end at 80,951.99, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 203.75 points to close at 24,609.70.

Borana Weaves IPO booked over 100 times: Check latest subscription, GMPAllotment for the Borana Weaves IPO is expected to be finalised on Friday, May 23, 2025. The company is likely to list its shares on the stock exchanges on Tuesday, May 27, 2025.
Reliance to start solar module factory this year: ReportThis year, Reliance Industries will launch its solar module factory, aiming to meet India's clean energy goals by producing 20 GW annually.

World's happiest and unhappiest careers revealed. Is your job among them?Researchers at the University of Tartu in Estonia looked at 263 different jobs and asked over 59,000 people about their work and life satisfaction. They also used health data from the Estonian Biobank to get a better picture of what really makes people happy in their jobs.

entertainment.headline: 'Typical Hindi heroine' Bipasha Basu says Jism changed how Bollywood saw womenActor Bipasha Basu recalled how she was looked at as a 'typical Hindi film heroine' until 'Jism' happened, and changed the perception of Bollywood.

Sidharth Malhotra praises Gram Chikitsalay, calls it a must watchBollywood actor Sidharth Malhotra is thoroughly impressed with Prime Video's 'Gram Chikitsalay'. The series features Amol Parashar and Vinay Pathak. It premiered on the OTT platform on May 9.

Aamir Khan, partner Gauri Spratt and son Azad step out for special lunch dateAamir Khan, his partner Gauri Spratt and his son Azad were seen visiting a plush restaurant in Mumbai for lunch. The trio were seen exiting the restaurant in a viral video.

Bhool Chuk Maaf box office Day 3: Heartland comedy wraps up decent 1st weekend Despite receiving mixed reviews, Rajkummar Rao's 'Bhool Chuk Maaf' collected decently in its opening weekend. The film is set against the backdrop of a wedding and time loop.

Game Changer editor slams director Shankar's work ethics: Had terrible experience'Game Changer' editor Shameer Muhammed called out director Shankar's unprofessionalism in a recent interview. He said that the filmmaker would turn up 10 days late for editing and called it a 'terrible experience'.

Mission Impossible 8 box office Day 9: Fails to hit Rs 100 crore after 2nd weekendTom Cruise's 'Mission Impossible - The Final Reckoning' is eyeing Rs 110 crore - the lifetime collection of the previous film in the franchise. However, the film has slowed down with current collection in the range of Rs 72 crore after nine days.

Amitabh Bachchan salutes India's Agniveers, celebrates country's booming GDP Actor Amitabh Bachchan shared a series of posts on social media, praising India's rise as the fourth-largest economy in the world. He also shared a tribute to the Indian army.

Gayathri lifts Super Singer Junior 10 trophy, wins villa worth Rs 60 lakhGayathri won the title of Vijay Television's Super Singer Junior 10, while Nasreen became the first runner-up. Kamal Haasan and AR Rahman were the chief guests for the musical night.

Sophie Turner turns cheerleader for Joe Jonas's new divorce-inspired albumSophie Turner extended her support for her ex-husband Joe Jonas's solo album, 'Music for People Who Believe in Love'. This move came months after the two parted ways.

OG release date out: Pawan Kalyan's film to hit screens in SeptemberPawan Kalyan's much-awaited Telugu action film 'OG' is set to release in September25, 2025. Directed by Sujeeth and featuring music by S Thaman, the film will be a gripping mafia drama alongside a star-studded cast.

Actor Ravi's 'companion', blamed for divorce, takes legal action after rape threatsActor Ravi Mohan's 'companion' Keneeshaa Francis has taken legal action against online abuse, rape and death threats. Her move comes after Ravi called her his partner amid his divorce battle with Aarti.
BTS with Aishwarya Rai on Day 2 at Cannes, courtesy designer Gaurav GuptaDesigner Gaurav Gupta shared behind-the-scenes glimpses of Aishwarya Rai and her daughter Aaradhya on day 2 of Cannes.

K3G actor Malvika Raaj and husband Pranav Bagga announce pregnancy'Kabhie Khushi Kabhie Gham' actor Malvika Raaj and her husband Pranav Bagga are expecting their first child. She sharing the happy news with adorable photos on Instagram.

Crunchyroll Anime Awards 2025 Full Winners List: Solo Leveling bags Anime of the yearThe 2025 Crunchyroll Anime Awards held in Tokyo celebrated the best in anime with Solo Leveling emerging as the biggest winner. The star-studded event also honoured Attack on Titan for its cultural impact and featured performances by popular artists, making it a grand celebration of anime's global influence.

Preity Zinta donates Rs 1.10 crore to help Army widows, children after Op SindoorActor Preity Zinta donated Rs 1.10 crore to the Army Wives Welfare Association after India's Operation Sindoor. The actor made the generous donation at an event held in Jaipur on May 24.

Kuberaa teaser: Dhanush, Nagarjuna's film explores power and wealthThe teaser of 'Kuberaa' starring Dhanush and Rashmika Mandanna is finally out. Sekhar Kammula's pan-Indian directorial will release in theatres on June 20.

Ankhen: The sanskari spy who shunned martinis and saved India'Ankhen' remains a landmark spy thriller of 1968 Bollywood, blending patriotism, action, and strong female roles. The film's unique gadgets and nostalgic style made it a classic Indian cinema.
Allu Arjun waves at fans as he steps out for weekend outing. WatchActor Allu Arjun stepped out for a weekend outing on May 24. In a viral video, he is seen waving to fans as he exits a showroom.

Ram Gopal Varma says Triptii Dimri will be next big thing in Bollywood after SpiritFilmmaker Ram Gopal Varma shared a post on X and praised Sandeep Reddy Vanga for casting Triptii Dimri in 'Spirit.' The actor will be seen opposite Prabhas.

general news.headline: Heavy rain pounds Mumbai, streets waterlogged, flights and local trains affected Live UpdatesMumbai weather: Several low-lying areas, local trains and flight operations have been affected after heavy rain and thunderstorms lashed Mumbai.

Pak army chief gifts PM Chinese drill photo to celebrate own strikes against IndiaThe photo was reportedly presented at a high-profile dinner hosted by Pakistan Field Marshal Asim Munir, Chief of Army Staff. It quickly became the subject of widespread mockery on social media.

Putin's chopper was 'at epicentre' of Ukrainian drone attack, claims Russian commanderA Russian military commander has claimed that President Vladimir Putin's helicopter was 'at the epicentre' of the Ukrainian drone attack on May 20.

New satellite image shows damage to Pak's Murid airbase in Indian strikeNew satellite image reveals damage caused to the Pakistan Air Force base in Murid after Indian Air Force's precise strike - Operation Sindoor.

Video: Rain chaos in Mumbai, water enters hospital, roads submergedMumbai is experiencing heavy rainfall as the monsoon advances further after making landfall in Kerala. On Monday morning, the India Meteorological Department issued a warning for the city, forecasting thunderstorms with lightning, intense rain spells, and gusty winds reaching 50–60 kmph.

Heavy rain lashes coastal Karnataka, Mysuru, Kodagu, light showers in BengaluruThe Met department has issued a red alert for coastal Karnataka, warning of extremely heavy rain, thunderstorms, and lightning. North interior Karnataka is on orange alert with very heavy rain forecast over the next two days. On Monday, Bengaluru saw light drizzles.

What the hell...: Trump loses cool after Putin launches war's biggest air attackDonald Trump, who had been patient with Vladimir Putin, slammed him after Russia's largest airstrike on Ukraine killed 12. Calling out the violence, Trump said, "What the hell happened to him?"

S Jaishankar, Canada's Foreign Minister hold first talks in bid to reset tiesThe conversation centred on strengthening economic cooperation and advancing shared priorities. It comes amid cautious optimism in New Delhi over a potential diplomatic reset ties with Ottawa following the exit of Justin Trudeau.

New Covid-19 variants detected in India: Should you be worried?India has detected new Covid-19 subvariants NB.1.8.1 and LF.7 in Tamil Nadu and Gujarat. Experts say cases remain mild but advise boosters and caution for high-risk groups.

Amazon Fashion's 'SERVE' Store Offers Convenience, Selection and Value to Gen Z, says Nikhil Sinha, Director, Amazon FashionIndia's first dedicated Gen Z fashion store democratizes style access across the country with 3X customer growth

Far more vulnerable: Himanta Sarma shares map of Bangladesh's '2 chicken necks'Intensifying his attack on Bangladesh's interim chief Muhammad Yunus, Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma asserted that the neighbouring country has "two chicken necks", which are far more vulnerable than India's Chicken Neck, also known as Siliguri Corridor.

Who can challenge Carlos Alcaraz on clay in the post-Nadal era? French Open 2025 ushers in a new era with Carlos Alcaraz poised to defend his crown. With Sinner surging, Djokovic seeking redemption, and dark horses in the mix, Paris is set for a gripping battle to decide the next ruler of Roland Garros.
Why Indian astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla has been put into quarantineThe Ax-4 mission is scheduled for launch on June 8, 2025 from the Kennedy Space Centre aboard a SpaceX Dragon spacecraft.

Live: Weather bureau warns of intense rain in Mumbai, winds up to 60 kmphMumbai weather live update: Thunderstorms with lightning and gusty winds lashed Mumbai on Monday morning, disrupting suburban train services and slowing road traffic amid poor visibility, officials said. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) announced that the southwest monsoon has arrived in Maharashtra nearly ten days ahead of schedule — the earliest since 1990. Civic officials reported continuous rainfall since Sunday night, with some low-lying areas experiencing flooding. The IMD has forecast light to moderate rain in parts of the city over the next 24 hours. Stay with IndiaToday.in for live updates:

PM Modi holds roadshow in Gujarat in first visit since Operation SindoorPrime Minister Narendra Modi will launch development projects worth Rs 82,000 crore during his two-day visit to Gujarat on May 26-27.

Amitabh Bachchan salutes India's Agniveers, celebrates country's booming GDP Actor Amitabh Bachchan shared a series of posts on social media, praising India's rise as the fourth-largest economy in the world. He also shared a tribute to the Indian army.

11 injured in South Carolina beach town shooting, operation underway: PoliceAs many as 11 people were injured in a mass shooting on Sunday night in the South Carolina beach town of Little River, authorities said.

Woman blames manager for fake 'Piyush Gupta' post, claims she was blackmailedJanney Hujic, a Singapore-based professional, went viral on May 21 after sharing a detailed post and a picture of her "chance encounter" with a man whom she mistook for former DBS Bank CEO Piyush Gupta.

Shehbaz Sharif thanks 'dear brother' Erdogan for backing Pak against IndiaTurkish President Erdogan met Pakistan PM Shehbaz Sharif in Istanbul weeks after the India-Pakistan conflict. They pledged to boost ties in defence, trade, and counter-terrorism. Erdogan reaffirmed support for Pakistan and called their bond "unbreakable."

Nadal emotional as Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic join French Open tributeFrench Open 2025: Rafael Nadal was honoured at Roland Garros on Sunday in a powerful farewell ceremony that paid tribute to his unparalleled dominance on the Paris clay.

More terrorists in Pak than all over world: Ghulam Nabi Azad in BahrainGhulam Nabi Azad, who is part of the all-party delegation led by BJP MP Baijayant Jay Panda, is currently in Bahrain to covey India's anti-terror message.

No 'foreign wife' shopping: China warns against marriage scams in BangladeshThe Chinese embassy in Bangladesh warned its citizens not to fall for deceptive "cross-border dating" content on short video platforms or seek out so-called "foreign wives" through informal networks or commercial matchmaking agencies,

My privilege: Trump extends deadline for 50% EU tariffs until July 9US President Trump agreed to delay the planned 50% tariffs on EU goods until July 9 after a call with European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen. Ursula von der Leyen said talks would now proceed rapidly.

2.5-year-old girl raped by teacher at summer camp in MaharashtraA 2.5-year-old girl was allegedly raped by her 45-year-old dance teacher at a summer camp in Maharashtra's Ulhasnagar. The accused was sent to three days of police custody by a local court.

sports.headline: Top spot at stake as Mumbai Indians face off against Punjab KingsMumbai Indians (MI) are set to take on Punjab Kings (PBKS) in an all-important clash of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025), which will guarantee a top two finish for either of the sides.

Not easy winning a title and then defending it: Ajinkya RahaneIPL 2025: Ajinkya Rahane said that the Knight Riders struggled in the batting department, although their bowlers did reasonably well throughout. On Sunday, the Knights lost to Sunrisers Hyderabad by 110 runs in New Delhi.

Who can challenge Carlos Alcaraz on clay in the post-Nadal era? French Open 2025 ushers in a new era with Carlos Alcaraz poised to defend his crown. With Sinner surging, Djokovic seeking redemption, and dark horses in the mix, Paris is set for a gripping battle to decide the next ruler of Roland Garros.

SRH's final game serves a reminder of an IPL season that could have beenSRH beat KKR with a scintillating display of batting in their final game of the IPL 2025. The performance served a reminder of the season that could have been for SRH.

Relieved I didn't face Nadal: Federer recalls French Open 2009 winRoger Federer went down the memory lane to his French Open 2009 win, saying that he was relieved after not facing Rafael Nadal, who won the title four times from 2005 to 2008.

Given Shami's quality, he will bounce back strongly next season: SRH coachSunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) head coach Daniel Vettori has backed fast bowler Mohammed Shami to bounce back strongly next season after his forgettable return to the Indian Premier League (IPL). Shami picked just six wickets from nine matches as he looked completely out of rhythm for the entire season.

Harsh Dubey will become a complete all-rounder by next IPL season: Daniel VettoriSunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) head coach Daniel Vettori has backed rising star Harsh Dubey to grow immensely as an all rounder by the next season of the Indian Premier League (IPL).

Batters took undue pressure: Rahane dissects KKR's poor seasonIPL 2025: Skipper Ajinkya Rahane said that poor batting led to Kolkata Knight Riders' (KKR) downfall in the tournament. The Knights finished their campaign with a 110-run defeat to the Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH).

Day 2 Order of Play: Swiatek, Alcaraz, Sinner begin campaignFrench Open 2025, Day 2 Order of Play: Defending champions Carlos Alcaraz and Iga Swiatek will begin their campaign on Monday. The likes of Jannik Sinner, Naomi Osaka and Paula Badosa will also be in action.

Ben Shelton bounces back from trouble to fend off Lorenzo SonegoFrench Open 2025: Ben Shelton defeated Italy's Lorenzo Sonego 6-4, 4-6, 3-6, 6-2, 6-2 in his maiden appearance at Philippe-Chatrier on Sunday, May 25.

Will Suresh Raina return as CSK batting coach? Assistant bowling coach respondsFormer India batter Suresh Raina hinted on air that he has been approached to take up the role of batting coach at Chennai Super Kings. However, CSK assistant coach Sridharan Sriram neither confirmed nor denied Raina's potential return to the franchise in any capacity.

Harsh Dubey will become a complete all-rounder by next IPL season: Daniel VettoriSunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) head coach Daniel Vettori has backed rising star Harsh Dubey to grow immensely as an all rounder by the next season of the Indian Premier League (IPL).

Batters took undue pressure: Rahane dissects KKR's poor seasonIPL 2025: Skipper Ajinkya Rahane said that poor batting led to Kolkata Knight Riders' (KKR) downfall in the tournament. The Knights finished their campaign with a 110-run defeat to the Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH).

Day 2 Order of Play: Swiatek, Alcaraz, Sinner begin campaignFrench Open 2025, Day 2 Order of Play: Defending champions Carlos Alcaraz and Iga Swiatek will begin their campaign on Monday. The likes of Jannik Sinner, Naomi Osaka and Paula Badosa will also be in action.

Ben Shelton bounces back from trouble to fend off Lorenzo SonegoFrench Open 2025: Ben Shelton defeated Italy's Lorenzo Sonego 6-4, 4-6, 3-6, 6-2, 6-2 in his maiden appearance at Philippe-Chatrier on Sunday, May 25.

Will Suresh Raina return as CSK batting coach? Assistant bowling coach respondsFormer India batter Suresh Raina hinted on air that he has been approached to take up the role of batting coach at Chennai Super Kings. However, CSK assistant coach Sridharan Sriram neither confirmed nor denied Raina's potential return to the franchise in any capacity.

What makes Suryakumar Yadav so consistent? Will Jacks explainsWill Jacks revealed what makes Suryakumar Yadav so consistent in the IPL as the MI batter continues his fine run this season. Suryakumar has scored 583 runs in 13 matches this season.

SRH cannot play worse than they did in IPL 2025: CumminsSunRisers Hyderabad captain Pat Cummins believes his team should have reached the final of the IPL this season. He reflected on the team's inconsistent middle phase and expressed optimism for next season.

Lando Norris relishes dream Monaco win as driver's championship intensifiesLando Norris clinched a dream victory at the Monaco Grand Prix, boosting McLaren's title hopes. The win tightens the championship race and highlights Mercedes' ongoing struggles.

Jasmine Paolini battles past Yuan Yue to reach second roundFrench Open: Last year's runner-up, Jasmine Paolini, was made to work hard in her opening match at the French Open, eventually securing a 6-1, 4-6, 6-3 win over China's Yuan Yue in a tense first-round encounter on Sunday.

Premier League final day: Who qualified for Champions, Europa and Conference leagueManchester City, Chelsea, and Newcastle United clinched their places in next season's Champions League. Meanwhile, Aston Villa's defeat at Manchester United consigned them to the Europa League, while Nottingham Forest's loss to Chelsea saw them slip into the Europa Conference League.

Klaasen record 105, SRH's 278 too good for clueless KKR in season-ending clashHeinrich Klaasen's record hundred and a disciplined performance from the bowlers handed SRH a xx-run win over KKR in Delhi on Sunday, May 25. The win helped SRH finish above KKR, who are all set to finish in the bottom three.

Musetti and Zheng Qinwen book second round spots at Roland GarrosFrench Open 2025: Lorenzo Musetti and Zheng Qinwen secured straight-sets wins to reach the second round. Qinwen beat Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova 6-4, 6-3 while Frances Tiafoe also defeated Roman Safiullin 6-4, 7-5, 6-4.

Nadal emotional as Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic join French Open tributeFrench Open 2025: Rafael Nadal was honoured at Roland Garros on Sunday in a powerful farewell ceremony that paid tribute to his unparalleled dominance on the Paris clay.

Premier League final day: Who qualified for Champions, Europa and Conference leagueManchester City, Chelsea, and Newcastle United clinched their places in next season's Champions League. Meanwhile, Aston Villa's defeat at Manchester United consigned them to the Europa League, while Nottingham Forest's loss to Chelsea saw them slip into the Europa Conference League.

Klaasen record 105, SRH's 278 too good for clueless KKR in season-ending clashHeinrich Klaasen's record hundred and a disciplined performance from the bowlers handed SRH a xx-run win over KKR in Delhi on Sunday, May 25. The win helped SRH finish above KKR, who are all set to finish in the bottom three.

Musetti and Zheng Qinwen book second round spots at Roland GarrosFrench Open 2025: Lorenzo Musetti and Zheng Qinwen secured straight-sets wins to reach the second round. Qinwen beat Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova 6-4, 6-3 while Frances Tiafoe also defeated Roman Safiullin 6-4, 7-5, 6-4.

Nadal emotional as Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic join French Open tributeFrench Open 2025: Rafael Nadal was honoured at Roland Garros on Sunday in a powerful farewell ceremony that paid tribute to his unparalleled dominance on the Paris clay.

278/3: SRH maul KKR to hit 3rd highest total in IPL historyIPL 2025: SunRisers Hyderabad scored 278 runs against Kolkata Knight Riders in their final IPL game. Klaasen's rapid century helped SRH record the 3rd highest total in the history of the tournament.

SRH's Heinrich Klaasen hits joint-third-fastest IPL hundred to decimate KKRSunrisers Hyderabad batter Heinrich Klaasen hit the joint third-fastest hundred in the Indian Premier League against Kolkata Knight Riders at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi.

Southampton appoint Will Still as manager to lead Premier League returnSouthampton have appointed 32-year-old Will Still as their new manager on a three-year deal. He is tasked with guiding the club back to the Premier League after their earliest-ever relegation.

CSK finish last place for first time in history of IPLChennai Super Kings ended IPL 2025 in last place for the first time despite a strong win in the final match. MS Dhoni said after the match that he was undecided about his future.

MS Dhoni confirms Ruturaj Gaikwad to continue as CSK captain in IPL 2026After leading CSK to a win over GT in their final match of the IPL 2025, MS Dhoni confirmed that Ruturaj Gaikwad will resume the captaincy role in the side from IPL 2026 after returning from his elbow injury.

IPL playoffs: Advantage MI and RCB in top two race after GT suffer heavy lossDespite all four playoff spots being confirmed in IPL 2025, none of the qualified teams - Gujarat Titans (GT), Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), Punjab Kings (PBKS), and Mumbai Indians (MI) - have secured a top-two finish yet. With just a few matches remaining, the race for the top two spots, which offers a crucial second chance via Qualifier 1, remains wide open.

Dhoni on IPL 2026 plans: Will enjoy a few bike rides in Ranchi and then decideMS Dhoni has said that he has time on his side and will make a decision on his IPL future in the coming few months. Dhoni said he will enjoy a 'few bike rides' in Ranchi and take the next couple of months to make the call.

GT's top-two hopes fade after twin setbacks, CSK wrap up season in styleChennai Super Kings may have exited IPL 2025 at the bottom, but their young stars lit up Ahmedabad and exposed glaring cracks in Gujarat Titans' setup, raising serious questions about GT's playoff readiness in both batting depth and bowling control.

Shubman Gill will have to lead from front on tough England tour: Harbhajan SinghFormer India spinner Harbhajan Singh welcomed the appointment of Shubman Gill as captain, praising the move as a step toward building a future-ready team.

Dhoni's runs have come in losing cause, he's dropped 4 catches: Aakash ChopraFormer India cricketer turned commentator Aakash Chopra has highlighted MS Dhoni's poor performances in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

French Open: Sabalenka, Svitolina cruise into 2nd round with easy winsAryna Sabalenka laid down the marker as she crushed Kamilla Rakhimova with a straight-sets win on Sunday, May 25. Elina Svitolina breezed past Zeynep Sonmez to make it to the second round.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.
